H0.text: Fair is the most likely weather in Massachusetts when white, fluffy clouds appear.

H1.text: Stormy weather is most likely the condition when white, fluffy clouds appear in Massachusetts.

H2.text: Foggy is the most likely weather in Massachusetts on a day when white, fluffy clouds appear.

H3.text: Rainy will be the most likely weather in Massachusetts when white, fluffy clouds appear.

A4.text: Cumulus humilis clouds usually indicate fair weather.

A5.text: Cumulus clouds usually produce little or no precipitation.
